about-description: Flathub is the place to get and distribute apps for Linux. It is powered by Flatpak which allows Flathub apps to run on almost any Linux distribution.
permission-denied: You don't have permission to do that.
rss-feeds-description: You can now subscribe to our RSS feeds to get the latest Flathub goodies in your feed reader!
failed-to-load-refresh: The resource failed to load. Try refreshing.
safe-to-close-page: It is safe to close this page.
stripe-error-processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card. Try again later or with a different payment method.
badges-description: Official badges to promote your app on Flathub
badges-block: You can use these badges to promote your app on Flathub
app-install-error-try-again: Could not install the app. Try going back to the app store and installing again.
stripe-error-payment_intent_authenticati: Failed to authenticate your payment method. Please choose a different payment method and try again.
token-creation-placeholder: Enter a list of names on separate lines, each will identify a new ownership token.
purchase-terms-confirmation: I confirm that I have read the Flathub Terms & Conditions and consent to waiving the 14-day cooling off period associated with this digital download.
website-verification-instruction: Create a page at <1>{{webpage}}</1> containing the following token: <3>{{token}}</3> If the page already exists, add the token to it.
app-payment-information: The app developer has set a minimum payment of {{minvalue}} and a preferred payment of {{recvalue}}.
verification-instructions: Verify your app ID to indicate that your Flathub upload is approved by the app developer. You'll need to prove that you have control of the app via a website on the app's domain or by checking access to the app's account on a source code hosting site. The verified badge will be shown alongside the app name, publisher name, and the way that the app ID was verified.
website-verification-main-instruction: Verify your right to use the app ID <1>{{id}}</1> by placing a token at a specific page on <3>{{domain}}</3>.
login-provider-verification-main-instruc: Verify your right to use the app ID <1>{{id}}</1> by logging into the account <3>{{login_name}}</3> on <5>{{login_provider}}</5>.
Verify your right to use the app ID <1>{{id}}</1> by logging into an account with admin rights to the <3>{{login_name}}</3> organisation on <5>{{login_provider}}</5>.
login-provider-verification-switch-accou: You are currently logged in to <1>{{login_provider}}</1> as <3>{{current_name}}</3>. Log in as <5>{{required_name}}</5> to verify <7>{{appId}}</7> by login provider, or choose another method if one is available.
login-provider-verification-user-does-no: The account <1>{{required_name}}</1> does not exist on <3>{{login_provider}}</3>. You must claim this account name and use it to verify your app, or ideally, choose an app ID that you have control over. See <5>the Flatpak documentation</5> for information about good app IDs.
login-provider-verification-not-org-admi: You are currently logged in to <1>{{login_provider}}</1> as <3>{{current_name}}</3>. This account is not an admin of the <5>{{organization}}</5> organisation. To verify this app, you must request admin privileges in the organisation or sign into an account that already has them.
could-not-find-page: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.
delete-account-entry: I wish to delete my account
stripe-error-incorrect_number: The card number is incorrect. Check the card's number or use a different card.
value-at-least: You must enter a value of at least {{value}}
unauthorized-to-view: You are unauthorised to view this content.
verification-warning: The Flathub team may remove the verification badge from any app at our sole discretion, for example, if it could mislead people about the app's official status or cause confusion regarding a trademark.
verified-manually-tooltip: The ownership of the <1>{{app_id}}</1> app ID has been manually verified by the Flathub team
verified-website-tooltip: The ownership of the <1>{{app_id}}</1> app ID has been verified using <4>{{website}}</4>
verified-login-provider-tooltip: The ownership of the <1>{{app_id}}</1> app ID has been verified by <4>{{login_name}}</4> on <8>{{login_provider}}</8>
failed-to-find-token: Failed to find token in response from {{domain}}.
flathub-description: Find and install hundreds of apps and games for Linux. Enjoy Firefox, Telegram, RetroArch, GIMP and many more!
retry-or-go-home: You might want to retry or go back <2>home</2>.
acknowledgements-block: Flathub wouldn't be possible without the generous support of the following organisations and individuals.
badge-copyright: To the extent possible by law, <2>Jakub Steiner</2> has waived all copyright and related or neighbouring rights to <5>Flathub Badges</5>. This work is published from Czechia.
rss-description: Subscribe to RSS feeds from Flathub
could-not-find-match-for-search: Could not find any apps matching your search.
request-new-app: If you're searching for a specific app, let the community know you want it on Flathub <1>here</1>.
languages-summary: Choose the language you want to see the website in.
languages-description: Select a language to switch to it:
no-saved-payment-methods: No saved payment methods to show.
transaction-went-wrong: Something went wrong with this transaction.
stripe-declined-generic_decline: The card was declined for an unknown reason.
stripe-error-expired_card: The card has expired. Check the expiration date or use a different card.
stripe-error-incorrect_cvc: The card's security code is incorrect. Check the card's security code or use a different card.
stripe-validation-error: An invalid card detail was entered.
vending-dashboard: Go to your Stripe Express account
account-deletion-token-mismatch: The account deletion request failed to authenticate.
privacy-policy-description: By using this website, you agree to the Privacy Policy.
terms-and-conditions-description: By using this website, you agree to the Terms and Conditions.
contribute-languages: All these translations have been contributed by the community. If you want to help translate Flathub, please <1>join the Flathub translation team</1>.
select-purchase-amount: Enter the amount you wish to pay
payment-provider-error: Our payment provider encountered an error. Try again later.
value-at-most: You must enter a value of at most {{value}}
manual-install-instructions: Make sure you follow the <2>setup guide for your Linux distribution</2> before installing
an-error-occurred-server: {{errorCode}} - An error occurred on the server.
login-provider-verification-instruction: We'll try to verify your access to the app with your login <1>{{login_name}}</1> with your account on <3>{{login_provider}}</3>
app-is-currently-verified-by-login-provi: Your app is currently verified by your login <1>{{login_name}}</1> with your account on <3>{{login_provider}}</3>
app-is-currently-verified-by-website: Your app is currently verified by your website <1>{{website}}</1>
app-is-currently-verified-manually: Your app is currently verified by the Flathub team
app-is-currently-not-verified: Your app is currently not verified
login-provider-verification-enable-githu: To continue verification, Flathub needs permission to read your membership level in the <1>{{organization}}</1> organisation. You can grant this permission <3>in your GitHub settings</3>.
login-provider-verification-not-org-memb: You are currently logged in to <1>{{login_provider}}</1> as <3>{{current_name}}</3>. This account is not a member of the <5>{{organization}}</5> organisation. To verify this app, you must request admin privileges in the organisation or sign into an account that already has them.
login-provider-verification-failed: The verification requirements were not met.
about-pagename: About Flathub: The Linux App Store
stripe-api-error: The Stripe API encountered an error. Try again later.
network-error-try-again: There was a network error. Try again.
error-already-logged-in: The selected account is already logged in.
website-validation-instruction: Create a page at <2>{{ webpage }}</2> containing the following token: <5>{{token}}</5> If the page already exists, add the token to it.
login-provider-verification-main-instruc: Verify your right to use the app ID <1>{{id}}</1> by logging into the account <3>{{login_name}}</3> (or, if <5>{{login_name}}</5> is an organisation, an account with access to it) on <7>{{login_provider}}</7>.
setup-flathub-description: Set up Flathub to install and update apps on your system.
rss-apps: Do you need an RSS app? Find excellent ones on <2>Flathub</2>.
consultants-description: Consulting services for submitting apps to Flathub.
moderation-no-review-requests: No reviews to show for this app.
moderation-dev-description: Some changes to an app's metadata, such as its name or description, need to be reviewed by the Flathub team. You can view the status of current and past review requests here.
flathub-index-description: Get the latest versions of all your favourite apps, for any Linux distribution
app-eol: This application is no longer available on Flathub
app-already-exists: An app with this ID already exists.
community-repository-description: Upload your app to Flathub by uploading your Flatpak manifest and supporting files to a repository in our GitHub organisation. Flathub's buildbot will build the app and publish it to Flathub.
direct-upload-description: Build your app in your own continuous integration environment and upload it directly to Flathub.
app-id-instructions: App IDs use reverse domain name notation (RDNN). For example, GNOME Maps uses 'org.gnome.Maps'. Pick a domain you have control over, such as the project's website (or, if you're uploading as an individual, your own website). If no website is available, you can also use a domain associated with a source code hosting account, such as 'io.github.<your_username>.<app_name>'.
malformed-app-id: The app ID is malformed. App IDs must contain at least three segments, and no segment may be empty. Each segment must start with a letter or underscore and may only contain letters, digits, underscores, and hyphens.
publisher-agreement-accept: I accept the Publisher Submission Agreement
developer-invited: You have been invited to become a developer
can-read-all-data-on-file-system: Can read all data on the file system
token-created: Copy this token and store it in a secure location, such as the secrets store of your CI pipeline. It grants read and write access to your app's builds.
can-read-home-folder: Can read all data in your home folder
invite-not-found-description: The invite you are trying to accept or decline does not exist. It might have been cancelled or declined.
scope-build: Create and access builds and jobs
leave-confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave {{app}}?
can-read-write-all-data-on-file-system: Can read and write all data on the file system
name: Name
can-access-hardware-devices: Can access hardware devices such as webcams or gaming controllers
revoke-token-description: Are you sure you want to revoke the token '{{name}}'?
invite-code-hint: Give this code to another developer to allow them to invite you to their app.
can-access-system-devices: Can access system devices which require elevated permissions
remove-developer-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {{developer}} from {{app}}?
can-read-write-your-downloads: Can read and write all data in your downloads folder
invite-developer-description: Enter the developer's invite code to invite them to become a developer of this app. They can find the code on the {{developersTab}} tab of their account page.
can-access-input-devices: Can access input devices such as keyboards, mice or gaming controllers
addon-install-info-text: Please use the flatpak manager supplied by your distribution to install add-ons.
can-access-and-change-user-settings: Can access and change user settings
proprietary-explanation: This app is not developed in the open, so only its developers know how it works. It may be insecure in ways that are hard to detect, and it may change without oversight.
community-built-explanation: This app is developed in the open by an international community, and released under the <1>{{ license }}</1>.

quality-guideline.app-icon-footprint: Doesn't fill too much or too little of the canvas
quality-guideline.app-icon-size: SVG or PNG of at least 256px
quality-guideline.app-icon-detail: Not too much or too little detail
quality-guideline.app-no-weird-formatting: No weird formatting, punctuation, lowercase, etc.
quality-guideline.request-review-description: Our team will review your App for quality problems. Please check back in a few days.
quality-guideline.request-a-review-question: Do you want to request a review?
quality-guideline.screenshots-include-window-shadow-and-ro: Include window shadow and rounded corners
quality-guideline.problems: If you would like to ask us about specific quality guideline problems, feel free to open <2>an issue</2>.

no-user-device-access-description: The App cannot access any user devices such as webcams or gaming controllers
proprietary-code-description: The source code is not public, so it cannot be independently audited and might be unsafe
flathub-the-linux-app-store: Flathub is the App Store for Linux
can-read-all-data: Can read all data in the directory
can-request-data-from-system-services: Can request data from system services
can-request-data-from-session-services: Can request data from session services
do-you-really-want-to-switch-to-direct-u: Are you sure? Once you switch an application to direct uploading, there is no going back.
do-you-really-want-to-archive-app: Are you sure? This will invalidate upload tokens and archive the application.
auditable-code-description: The source code is public and can be independently audited, which makes the App more likely to be safe
software-developer-verified-description: The software developer has verified their identity, which makes the App more likely to be safe
uses-eol-runtime-description: The runtime used by this App is no longer receiving security updates
no-file-system-access-description: Cannot access the file system at all
can-read-write-home-folder: Can read and write all data in your home folder
can-read-write-all-data: Can read and write all data in the directory
can-read-all-data-in-your-download-folde: Can read all data in your downloads folder
rebase-onto-other-app: Enter app ID your application will be rebased into
reporting-issues-description: We take security reports and legal issues very seriously
press-description: We're always happy to answer questions from and arrange interviews with journalists and tech writers
updated-description: Apps updated on Flathub in the last few days.
new-description: New apps published on Flathub in the last few days.
developers-and-users-block: Connect with the team and other members of the community to ask questions and share your expertise
special-license-explanation: This app is developed under the special licence <1>{{ license }}</1>.
you-may-or-may-not-be-able-to-contribute: You may or may not be able to contribute to this app.
flathub-statistics-description: Overview of the usage and distribution of apps available on the platform.
can-listen-using-microphones-without-ask: Can listen using microphones and play audio without asking permission
can-access-the-contents-of-the-screen-or: Can access the contents of the screen or other windows
apps-for-you-where-you-are: <0>Apps for you where you are</0> — Whether you're on a Steam Deck, a powerful Linux workstation, a Raspberry Pi, or the rare Linux phone; Flathub has apps for you
docs-guidance: <0>Clear docs & guidance</0> — Extensive <2>documentation</2>, thousands of public <5>app manifests</5>, and a large community means you're always able to get help
transparent: <0>Independent & transparent</0> — We're a grassroots open source community stewarding the best of what the ecosystem has to offer
integration: <0>Native app store integration</0> — Forget web downloads; Flathub delivers apps and <3>automatic updates</3> to users in their native app store client where they'd expect
about-claim: <0>Whether you're a user looking for apps or a developer looking to reach more users, <2>Flathub is the best choice for apps on Linux.</2></0>
all-the-apps-you-want: <0>All the apps you want</0> — From big names you'd expect to fresh indie developers, Flathub has thousands of apps to meet your needs.
transparent-safety: <0>Transparent safety</0> — Clearly see when an app is <3>verified</3> as coming from its developer, what permissions it requires, and whether or not it's open source and auditable
tastefully-curated: <0>Tastefully curated</0> — Discover interesting, quality apps across Flathub with our staff curation that showcases the best on offer
millions-users: <0>Reach millions of users</0> — Flathub comes out of the box on multiple Linux distros, is <2>easily installable</2> on the rest, and has over a million active users

quality.banner-preview-description: To easily experiment with your banner, use <2>the banner preview</2>

mobile-apps-description: Apps for your Linux phones and tablets
game-section-description: Games and apps to run your favourite retro games
